annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee blows for the end of today's match.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: GOAL 1:3! Marcelo found Lucas (Real Madrid) inside the box, he spotted goalkeeper Salvatore Sirigu off his line and chipped the ball into the net. What a cheeky lob!

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Goran Causic (Osasuna) violates the rules and gets a yellow card.
An opponent rises to his feet after being downed by Goran Causic (Osasuna). Ignacio Iglesias Villanueva saw the sliding tackle and blows for a foul.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: 3 min. of stoppage time to be played.
My grandmother could have scored that! Lucas (Real Madrid) blazed the ball just over the bar from close range!
Half chance! Jaime Romero (Osasuna) plays a pass into the box, but Keylor Navas reacts well to snuff out the attack.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Isco will be replaced by Mateo Kovacic (Real Madrid).

annotations.label: attendance
annotations.description: The attendance is 17770.
Sergio Leon (Osasuna) shoots from the edge of the penalty area. The ball travels towards the right side of the target, but Keylor Navas easily deals with the threat.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) takes a mid range shot, but the ball sails high over the bar.
One of the Osasuna players commits a holding foul and the referee reaches for his whistle.
Lucas (Real Madrid) attempts to set up his teammate with a scoring opportunity by chipping in a fine pass from the edge of the box, but one of the defenders intercepts his effort.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) is deemed to be in an offside position by the linesman and it looks like it is the right decision despite being a very close call.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: None of the Real Madrid players could reach the corner kick as the ball was overhit and goes out of play.

Salvatore Sirigu can hear the fans clapping for his superb goalkeeping after he magnificently stopped the close range effort from Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid). The ball would have probably ended up in the bottom right corner. Real Madrid have been awarded a corner kick.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Jaime Romero (Osasuna) is clearly asking for some medical attention with his painful gestures. The extent of his injury is yet to be discovered.
Jaime Romero (Osasuna) serves up a nice cross, but Keylor Navas punches the ball away.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee signals that it is time for a substitution and Lucas (Real Madrid) will replace Karim Benzema.
Alejandro Berenguer (Osasuna) brings his opponent down with a tackle and Ignacio Iglesias Villanueva blows his whistle for a foul.
The referee stops play as the linesman flags Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) offside.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Isco (Real Madrid) was in the right place at the right time to get to the rebound inside the box and gleefully rifles the ball low inside the left post. It's 1:2.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: James Rodriguez (Real Madrid) picks up a yellow card.
Ignacio Iglesias Villanueva couldn't ignore the rough tackle by James Rodriguez (Real Madrid) and blew his whistle.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Petar Vasiljevic decides to make a substitution. Antonio Fausto will be replaced by Raoul Loe (Osasuna).
Casemiro (Real Madrid) was trying to get to the ball but clattered into the legs of the opponent as well. Ignacio Iglesias Villanueva blows his whistle for an infringement.
Alejandro Berenguer (Osasuna) produces an effort from the edge of the box, but doesn't hit the ball properly and sends it yards over the bar.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee signals a substitution. James Rodriguez (Real Madrid) is brought on as a substitute for Danilo.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Danilo (Real Madrid) requires medical treatment, so the referee stops play and signals for the physio to come onto the pitch.
Wonderful pass from Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) for Cristiano Ronaldo, but they can't profit from it as Salvatore Sirigu comes off his line to collect.
Ignacio Iglesias Villanueva blows his whistle after Raphael Varane (Real Madrid) kicks an opponent's legs instead of the ball.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Juan Rafael Fuentes leaves the pitch and is replaced by Carlos Clerc (Osasuna).
Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) produces a cunning chipped pass for Cristiano Ronaldo, who takes it down well but fails to get past the defenders and loses the ball.
Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) skips past his man but can't keep the ball in play.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Osasuna have a chance to score from a corner kick, but the ball is cleared by a defender.

Sergio Leon (Osasuna) squanders a clear opportunity to score. He was one on one with Keylor Navas on the edge of the box and attempted to put the ball inside the left post, but was denied by a terrific save. It will be a corner kick for Osasuna.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Ignacio Iglesias Villanueva blows his whistle and the second half starts.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The end of the first half.
Sergio Leon (Osasuna) attempts to outfox the defender, but he only tricks himself after getting caught in the offside trap.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: We will have 2 min. of added time.
Marcelo (Real Madrid) takes a mid range shot, but it lacks accuracy and it goes way over the bar.
Antonio Fausto (Osasuna) commits a minor foul to interrupt the attacking move of his opponent and is warned by the referee that he will get a yellow card if he does it again.
Isco (Real Madrid) unleashes a shot from the edge of the box, but it goes straight at Salvatore Sirigu.

Keylor Navas can hear the fans clapping for his superb goalkeeping after he magnificently stops the close range effort from Nikola Vujadinovic (Osasuna). The ball would have probably ended up in the bottom left corner.
Casemiro (Real Madrid) tackles a bit over zealously and Ignacio Iglesias Villanueva blows for a foul.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid) takes a shot from the edge of the area, but it goes harmlessly wide of the right post.
Jaime Romero (Osasuna) swings a cross into the box, but it's far too close to Keylor Navas, who smothers the ball.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Antonio Fausto (Osasuna) is shown a yellow card by the referee.
A clumsy foul by Antonio Fausto (Osasuna) and Ignacio Iglesias Villanueva blows his whistle.
Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) takes a great touch after receiving a pass inside the box. He immediately unleashes a low shot to the middle of the goal, but the keeper pulls off a decent save!

Antonio Fausto (Osasuna) gets into a good scoring position. He creates some space for himself and tries his luck from distance. His decent effort towards the underside of the crossbar is, however, superbly saved by Keylor Navas!

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: GOAL! Sergio Leon (Osasuna) collects a pass and from inside the box he lifts the ball over Keylor Navas, who was off his line. What a finish that is! 1:1.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Osasuna take the corner, but their hopes of scoring a goal end with nice clearance by the defence.
Alejandro Berenguer (Osasuna) sends a cross into the box. However, the opponent's defence eliminates the danger by clearing the ball out. Osasuna win a corner.
Sergio Leon (Osasuna) sends a cross into the box, but Keylor Navas comes off his line to gather the ball.
Sergio Leon (Osasuna) sets the ball up and is ready to take the free kick from a promising distance. Many goals have been scored from this distance. Let's see what happens.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: The yellow card is received by Luka Modric (Real Madrid).
Luka Modric (Real Madrid) gives away a foul for a clumsy challenge. Referee Ignacio Iglesias Villanueva saw the whole situation.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: It's in the back of the net! Karim Benzema slips the ball through to Cristiano Ronaldo (Real Madrid), and he darts into the box to unleash a magnificent shot into the bottom left corner. He makes it 0:1.
Oier (Osasuna) makes a rough challenge and Ignacio Iglesias Villanueva blows his whistle for a foul.
Alejandro Berenguer (Osasuna) has an effort from the edge of the area, but he skies the ball over the top.
Referee Ignacio Iglesias Villanueva sees the trip by Nacho (Real Madrid) and doesn't hesitate to blow his whistle.
Keylor Navas hears the fans clapping his superb goalkeeping. Emmanuel Riviere (Osasuna) shoots from the edge of the box towards the bottom right corner, but the goalkeeper makes a magnificent save.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Tano Bonnin (Osasuna) just cannot continue due to injury and has to be substituted. David Garcia replaces him.

annotations.label: injury
annotations.description: Tano Bonnin (Osasuna) is writhing in pain and can now receive medical treatment after the referee decides to stop play.
Isco (Real Madrid) brings down his opponent with a very late tackle.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The resulting set piece from Osasuna is comfortably intercepted by one of the defending players.
A cross from a mid range free kick, taken by Osasuna, is intercepted by one of the defenders. The ball is out of play. Osasuna win a corner kick.
Casemiro (Real Madrid) is penalised for holding. Ignacio Iglesias Villanueva signals a set piece.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Juan Rafael Fuentes (Osasuna) is cautioned by the referee.
One of the Osasuna players tripped an opponent and conceded a foul.
One of the players from Osasuna times his run too early and the referee blows his whistle for offside.
A player from Osasuna commits an attacking foul. The referee blows his whistle.
Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) spurned a good chance! He gets a shot away from inside the penalty box, but it goes inches wide of the right post.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Real Madrid take a short corner instead of sending the ball into the penalty area.

The ball is cleared after Karim Benzema (Real Madrid) attempted to dribble past an opposing player. Real Madrid have been awarded a corner kick. The referee and one of his assistants both point at the corner flag.
Sergio Leon (Osasuna) sends a teasing cross into the area, but Keylor Navas intercepts the ball.
A player from Osasuna pulled an opponent down, forcing the referee to blow his whistle.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee blows his whistle and we are underway.
Real Madrid will kick the game off.
Ignacio Iglesias Villanueva will referee today's match.

annotations.label: lineup1
annotations.description: Before the start of the game, you can see the starting lineups for today's clash.
Welcome to our live text commentary, ladies and gentleman! The starting lineups will be announced very soon, so just sit back and get ready to enjoy the action.
Cristiano Ronaldo is the leading goal scorer for Real Madrid with 13 goals so far.
Osasuna haven't won for 13 matches in a row.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee blows for the end of today's match.
